results.content: I love how Jon is explaining everything nice but the course it's pretty old and could have been updated. Also I think it should be a little bit longer and included a few different modules.
results.content_html: I love how Jon is explaining everything nice but the course it's pretty old and could have been updated. Also I think it should be a little bit longer and included a few different modules.

results.content: Bad audio. A little bit improvised. Many pauses. Unfinished ideas. Some typing errors in the code he write (and he doesn't seem to notice it). The instructor moves away from solve certain problems (for example: unexpected behavior with overlay opacity at the end of the course). I expected much more from this course. But I must admit that, being the only tutorial that exists on the web on this specific topic, it has helped me a lot to understand how to create modules in BB.
results.content_html: Bad audio. A little bit improvised. Many pauses. Unfinished ideas. Some typing errors in the code he write (and he doesn't seem to notice it). The instructor moves away from solve certain problems (for example: unexpected behavior with overlay opacity at the end of the course). I expected much more from this course. But I must admit that, being the only tutorial that exists on the web on this specific topic, it has helped me a lot to understand how to create modules in BB.

results.content: Course was great and to the point: Nothing more and nothing less...all relevant and gave me a solid understanding and foundation to build my own modules.
results.content_html: Course was great and to the point: Nothing more and nothing less...all relevant and gave me a solid understanding and foundation to build my own modules.

results.content: Loved Jon's engaging style - a very thorough introduction to creating custom modules within Beaver Builder and a nice little off screen navigation plugin that can be used in my projects.  Highly recommended for those developers utilising Beaver Builder and wanting to expand its functionality.
results.content_html: Loved Jon's engaging style - a very thorough introduction to creating custom modules within Beaver Builder and a nice little off screen navigation plugin that can be used in my projects. Highly recommended for those developers utilising Beaver Builder and wanting to expand its functionality.

results.content: Really great for cutting straight to the point on how to build a custom module in Beaver Builder. I spent hours going through the custom module docs Beaver Builder has and it was very unclear, extremely long, and not as step-by-step as they made it out to be. This course was just what I needed.
results.content_html: Really great for cutting straight to the point on how to build a custom module in Beaver Builder. I spent hours going through the custom module docs Beaver Builder has and it was very unclear, extremely long, and not as step-by-step as they made it out to be. This course was just what I needed.

results.content: Jon has done a great job with this course and I recommend it to anyone new to building Beaver Builder modules. Before taking this course I had already built 3 modules even though I had some prior experience I learnt some new tricks and have a useful menu module at the end.
results.content_html: Jon has done a great job with this course and I recommend it to anyone new to building Beaver Builder modules. Before taking this course I had already built 3 modules even though I had some prior experience I learnt some new tricks and have a useful menu module at the end.

results.content: This was a very good opportunity to sort of peer over Jon's shoulder while he works and I found a ton of value in that. It would be nice to have better notes or supporting files since the code on the video isn't always easy to read. I suspect that's in the works though.
results.content_html: This was a very good opportunity to sort of peer over Jon's shoulder while he works and I found a ton of value in that. It would be nice to have better notes or supporting files since the code on the video isn't always easy to read. I suspect that's in the works though.

results.content:
Summarizing documentation, helps those who have trouble using the docs.
A bit unprepared presenter, at least the video should be edited out from mistakes.
All together a helpful course!
results.content_html:
Summarizing documentation, helps those who have trouble using the docs.

All together a helpful course!

results.content: I never knew how to develop a plugin. This gives me now the foundation to make a step towards building one.
results.content_html: I never knew how to develop a plugin. This gives me now the foundation to make a step towards building one.

results.content: Well put together Intro to extending Beaver Builder.
results.content_html: Well put together Intro to extending Beaver Builder.

results.content: Not worth £10, a little ad hoc in its structure and the information given.
results.content_html: Not worth £10, a little ad hoc in its structure and the information given.
